name: Rosemary KOPCHA, Appellant, v. Nicholas D. SALLIDINO and Scaramuzza's Pasta, Appellees

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Rosemary KOPCHA, Appellant, v. Nicholas D. SALLIDINO and Scaramuzza’s Pasta, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Peter J. McNamara, Philadelphia, for Rosemary Kopcha.
Dennis J. O’Leary, Philadelphia, for Nicholas D. Sallidino, and Scaramuzza’s Pasta.
casebody.head_matter:
782 A.2d 539
Rosemary KOPCHA, Appellant, v. Nicholas D. SALLIDINO and Scaramuzza’s Pasta, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 15, 2001.
Decided Oct. 26, 2001.
Peter J. McNamara, Philadelphia, for Rosemary Kopcha.
Dennis J. O’Leary, Philadelphia, for Nicholas D. Sallidino, and Scaramuzza’s Pasta.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
